com.nestlabs.sdk

Interface NestListener.GlobalListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NestListener
    Enclosing interface:
    NestListener

    public static interface NestListener.GlobalListener
extends NestListener
    Listens for updates to any objects in a user's Nest account, including all devices, structures and metadata.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.nestlabs.sdk.NestListener

        NestListener.AuthListener, NestListener.CameraListener, NestListener.DeviceListener, NestListener.GlobalListener, NestListener.MetadataListener, NestListener.SmokeCOAlarmListener, NestListener.StructureListener, NestListener.ThermostatListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUpdate(GlobalUpdate update)
      Called when an update occurs on any device, structure or metadata object.

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdate

        void onUpdate(GlobalUpdate update)
        Called when an update occurs on any device, structure or metadata object.
        Parameters:
        update - a GlobalUpdate object containing all values at the time of the update.
